About Us

SuperMike’s Remodeling is a full-service remodeling company serving Waller, TX and the surrounding areas. We offer a wide range of services, from home remodeling to home repairs. We are dedicated to providing our clients with quality workmanship and superior customer service.

What we are best at

Our Services

  • Bathroom Renovation
    Bathroom Renovation

    Our Bathroom Renovation service includes a complete renovation of your bathroom, from the floor to the ceiling. We'll work with you to design a bathroom that meets your needs and fits your budget.

  • Carpentry
    Carpentry

    Carpentry is a skilled trade in which the primary work is the cutting, shaping, and joining of timber and other materials to make objects. Our carpenters are experienced in a wide range of carpentry techniques and can help you with all your carpentry needs.

  • Deck & Patio Installation
    Deck & Patio Installation

    Our Deck & Patio Installation service can provide a beautiful and functional outdoor living space for your home. We have a wide variety of decking and patio materials to choose from, and our experienced installers will work with you to create the perfect space for your needs.

  • Flooring
    Flooring

    Our Flooring service installs and repairs all types of flooring, including hardwood, tile, and carpet. We also provide a wide variety of flooring options to choose from to ensure you find the perfect fit for your home.

  • Kitchen Renovation
    Kitchen Renovation

    Our Kitchen Renovation service is perfect for those who want to update their kitchen without the hassle and expense of a full remodel. We can update your cabinets, countertops, flooring, and more to give your kitchen a fresh new look.

  • Roofing
    Roofing

    We are a full-service roofing company that can install and repair any type of roof. We have over 29 years of experience and offer free estimates.

  • Other Repair Services
    Other Repair Services

    We offer a wide range of repair services, from small repairs to complete home remodeling. We have the experience and expertise to handle any repair job, big or small. Our team is dedicated to providing superior service and quality workmanship. We are here to help you get your home back in order!

  • Emergency services
    Emergency services

    Water heater broken? We can fix that. Frozen water lines or leaking? We can fix that. Flooded house? We got ya! Hurricane… We can fix it! Car break down, we have a 24hr mobile mechanic on call.
